This is episode 18 of our One Bedroom House series. Today you'll see how I go about adding annotations, tags, leaders and notes to a simple floor plan and drainage and electrical plan in AutoCAD Architecture 2020/2021.

I hope that you learn a thing or 3. Do me a favour - do one of the below...
